name: MATHLORE
description:
Fear is a concept for some and a reality for the rest, but what happens when you tread the line separating both? Young Jimmy had to find that out the hard way. And you, dear player, are responsible to make sure that he gets to the other side. Dive in and always remember - Don't let the fear catch up with you.

The developers of this game are:

Dyutin R (20BCG10060) https://dyu-things.itch.io/

Adithya N Biya (20BCG10029) https://adithyabiya.itch.io/

George Jose (20BCG10019) https://george20bcg10019.itch.io/

Nandakishor.V (20BCG10057) https://nandakishor-v.itch.io/

Sayanth Fredaric Chalissery (20BCG10056) https://justnoah.itch.io/

A: Move left

D: Move right

Space: Jump

Left Mouse Button: Erase/Attack
